result:
The epic day has finally arrived, and I couldn't be more excited to find out the results of the Monster Raffle Community Fundraiser for SteemSilverGold being organised at the @ssg-community. It's going to be a unique, memorable and exciting experience for the #steemsilvergold family.

The draw will be held tonight, so it's time gor me to announce the results of my final Giveaway. You can read about the previous results here. The 3rd Ticket Giveaway saw a total of 15 valid entries from as many amazing Steemians.

The list of participants in the giveaway and the unique numbers chosen by them is given below:
@vik3 - 72
@senstless - 42
@jasonmunapasee - 31
@thedamus - 13
@knowledge-seeker - 37
@rollingthunder - 10
@jjuuaanchoo - 51
@oluwashinaayomi - 32
@wizardave - 58
@coolfish - 3
@fremy - 65
@onionking - 6
@methus - 62
@dfinney - 74
@adivender - 21

The winners were picked through random.org:

  • Congrats @methus!

  • Congrats @onionking!

  • Congrats @thedamus!

1 SBD each has been sent on behalf of the winners to get them 1 entry ticket in today's Monster Community Raffle.

Congratulations to all the winners, and thanks to everyone who participated!

Thank you for reading!
